generic_name: PLANTAGO MAJOR, DELPHINIUM STAPHISAGRIA SEED, MATRICARIA CHAMOMILLA, SEPIA OFFICINALIS JUICE, ARNICA MONTANA, HYPERICUM PERFORATUM, STRYCHNOS NUX-VOMICA SEED, SPIGELIA ANTHELMIA, IRON, BARIUM CARBONATE, VERATRUM ALBUM ROOT, CALCIUM FLUORIDE, ANTIPYRINE, AND BISMUTH SUBNITRATE
warnings: Warnings Use only if cap seal is unbroken. If pregnant or breastfeeding, ask a healthcare professional before use. Keep this and all medication out of the reach of children.
dosage_administration: SUGGESTED DOSAGE One dropper under tongue two times daily. Acute symptoms ½ dropper under tongue every 30 minutes for two hours.
indications: INDICATIONS Toothaches, swollen gums, jaw pain.
